title: African American Civil War Memorial: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around       Public Transportation  It is highly recommended that you make use of the efficient public transit system (Metro rail and Metro bus). Information and schedules for Metro can be found at www.wmata.com. The nearest metro stop to the memorial is the green/yellow line, U street/African American Civil War Memorial Cardozo stop.  Â    Bicycling Information  It is possible to bicycle to the memorial and bicycle parking is provided. Please remember that riding your bicycle is not permitted within the memorial itself. Please walk your bicycle through the memorial or lock it up before entering. Your assistance in preserving a respectful and safe experience for all visitors is appreciated.  Bicycle rentals are available at the Thompson Boat Center located near the intersection of Virginia Avenue NW and Rock Creek Parkway NW. You can also rent bicycles at any of the Capital Bikeshare stations throughout Washington DC.
